question:
The North American dairy farming owes its development to which among the following breeds of cow?
  1. Guernsey and Jersey
  2. Holstein-Friesian
  3. Ayrshires
  4. Brown Swiss
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The best dairy cows that form the foundation of modern dairy farming in most parts of the world are native to Western Europe. The most popular dairy cow, the Holstein-Friesian originated in the coastal lowlands of the Netherlands and
Germany. Other popular dairy cows include Guernsey and Jersey from the Channel Islands, Ayrshires from Scotland and Brown Swiss from Switzerland. North American dairy farming owes its development to the introduction of these high milk producer cows.
